thread.title: Sarah Silverman’s ‘Swastikas’ Find Turns Out to Be Utility Marks
thread.title_full: Sarah Silverman’s ‘Swastikas’ Find Turns Out to Be Utility Marks

title: Sarah Silverman’s ‘Swastikas’ Find Turns Out to Be Utility Marks
text:
— ❄Godfrey Elfwick❄️️ (@GodfreyElfwick) February 13, 2017 
“The KKK guys left their hats down the street too,” a Twitter user named Eric Larson tweeted with a photo of traffic cones. — Eric Larson (@larsoneric50) February 13, 2017 
After realizing her major blunder, Silverman blamed the “innocent mistake” on President Donald Trump, naturally. — Sarah Silverman (@SarahKSilverman) February 13, 2017 “I'm seeing swastikas in everything fratboys. It started w Bannon's rise & festered when trump decided not 2 mention Jews re the Holocaust,” Silverman, who is Jewish, tweeted in a follow up. 
Silverman is also currently facing Twitter backlash for many of her old tweets. — Shauna (@ShaunaGee) February 13, 2017 
In one example from 2009, Silverman tweeted, “Wouldn't be AS disgusted if the nazis HAD to kill Jews- like in order to live- or if they used THE WHOLE JEW, a la native americans w cows.” 
A few months before that, Silverman had openly pondered if it’s molestation if the child makes the first move. — Sarah Silverman (@SarahKSilverman) July 7, 2009 
“Hey, is it considered molestation if the child makes the first move? I'm gonna need a quick answer on this.” Silverman tweeted on July 7, 2009. ...
